Note: Related to The gossips feast ( The gossips feast: or, a merry meeting of women kinde each other greeting. VVhich by a fire with spiced ale, told many a pleasant Christmas tale. To a delicate northerne tune: or, there was an old man sate piping, [London]: Printed at London [by M. Flesher?] for Thomas Lambert at the signe of the Hors-shoo in Smithfield, [1635?] )?
Title(s): ‘How þe gosyps made a royal feest’
_description: ‘How þe gosyps made a royal feest’ — in couplets
